Key Match Events: Teen Endrick scored his first goal for Brazil to give the struggling South Americans a 1-0 win over England
Pre-Game Insights: Southgate happy with 'good experiment' vs. Brazil
Miscellaneous Highlights: Seventeen year-old prodigy Endrick scored his first goal for Brazil to give the struggling South Americans a 1-0 win over England at Wembley in coach Dorival Junior's first match in charge
Others: Attempt saved. Endrick (Brazil) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner.
